message: Property storing for reading metadata now aligned with saving metadata, no more copying of values and ready for updating content-type (which requires all metadata to be set as well, or else the metadata is lost).

added: this.info = new ContainerInformationCommand(getAccount(), getClient(), getAccess(), this).call();
deleted: ContainerInformation info = new ContainerInformationCommand(getAccount(), getClient(), getAccess(), this).call();
